name: Sharpness
desc: Doubles or halves the rate at which your weapon loses Sharpness.

skilldesc.10: Halves the rate at which your weapon loses Sharpness
skilldesc.-10: Doubles the rate at which your weapon loses Sharpness

name: Handicraft
desc: Increases your weapon's Sharpness Level.

name: Fencing
desc: Prevents your attacks from being deflected.

name: Recoil
desc: Bowgun recoil is reduced or increased.

skilldesc.20: Bowgun recoil is reduced even greater.
skilldesc.15: Bowgun recoil is reduced further.
skilldesc.10: Bowgun recoil is reduced.
skilldesc.-10: Bowgun recoil is increased.
skilldesc.-20: Bowgun recoil is increased even greater.

name: NormalS Up
desc: Increases the damage of Normal S.

name: PierceS Up
desc: Increases the damage of Pierce S.

name: PelletS Up
desc: Increases the damage of Pellet S.

name: Normal S+
desc: Allows a bowgun to fire all Normal S levels.

name: Pierce S+
desc: Allows a bowgun to fire all or Lv1 Pierce S.

skilldesc.15: Allows a bowgun to fire all Pierce S level.
skilldesc.10: Allows a bowgun to fire Pierce S Lv1.

name: Status
desc: Increases or decreases the potency of Abnormal Status attacks.

skilldesc.10: Increases the potency of Abnormal Status attacks.
skilldesc.-10: Decreases the potency of Abnormal Status attacks.

name: Elemental
desc: Increases or decreases the power of Elemental attacks.

skilldesc.10: Increases the power of Elemental attacks.
skilldesc.-10: Decreases the power of Elemental attacks.

name: Hearing
desc: Unaffected by some or all monster roars.

skilldesc.15: Unaffected by all monster roars.
skilldesc.10: Unaffected by some monster roars (anything besides Elder Dragons, Gigginox, Deviljho, and Diablos).

name: Fate
desc: Chance of increasing or decreasing the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.

skilldesc.15: Often increases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.
skilldesc.10: Sometimes increases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.
skilldesc.-10: Sometimes decreases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.
skilldesc.-15: Often decreases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.

name: Stamina
desc: Slows down or Speeds up stamina depletion for actions other than evasion and blocking.

skilldesc.10: Slows down Stamina depletion for actions other than evasion and blocking.
skilldesc.-10: Speeds up Stamina depletion for actions other than evasion and blocking.

name: Loading
desc: Increases the loadable amount of all usable ammo by one.

name: Carving
desc: Prevents knockbacks from everything other than Wind Pressure while carving.  Higher levels sometimes boosts number of carving chances.

skilldesc.15: Grants Carving Pro effects and sometimes boosts number of carving chances.
skilldesc.10: Prevents knockbacks from everything other than Wind Pressure while carving.

name: Evade Dist
desc: Increases evasion distance.

name: Tranquilzr
desc: Rewards an additional Capture Reward Item for capturing a monster (no additional item for capturing more monsters of the same type).

name: FastCharge
desc: Decreases or increases charging time for charge attacks (Greatswords and Hammers) and gauges (Long Swords  and Switch Axes).

skilldesc.10: Decreases charging time for charge attacks (Greatswords and Hammers) and gauges (Long Swords and Switch Axes).
skilldesc.-10: Increases charging time for charge attacks charge attacks (Greatswords and Hammers) and gauges (Long Swords and Switch Axes).

name: PunishDraw
desc: Grants the ability to stun (KO) monsters with draw attacks.

name: FreeElemnt
desc: Releases the latent elemental properties in weapons that don't have elements.

name: Rapid Fire
desc: Allows one extra shot to be fired while rapid firing.

name: Poison
desc: Prevents or doubles the damage received from poison.

skilldesc.10: Prevents poison.
skilldesc.-10: Doubles the damage received from poison.

name: Health
desc: Increases or decreases maximum Health.

skilldesc.15: Increases maximum Health by 50.
skilldesc.10: Increases maximum Health by 20.
skilldesc.-10: Decreases maximum Health by 10.

name: Rec Speed
desc: Increases or decreases recovery speed from temporary damage (the red portion of the Health Gauge).

skilldesc.15: Greatly speeds recovery from temporary damage (the red portion of the Health Gauge).
skilldesc.10: Speeds recovery from temporary damage (the red part of the Health Gauge).
skilldesc.-10: Slows recovery from temporary damage (the red portion of the Health Gauge).
skilldesc.-15: Greatly slows recovery from temporary damage (the red portion of the Health Gauge).

name: Expert
desc: Increases or decreases Affinity (chance to deal either 25% more or 25% less damage with a weapon attack).

skilldesc.15: Increases Affinity by 20% (5% effective damage).
skilldesc.10: Increases Affinity by 10% (2.5% effective damage).
skilldesc.-10: Decreases Affinity by 5% (-1.25% effective damage).

name: Sharpener
desc: Weapons are sharpened much faster or much longer.

skilldesc.10: Weapons are sharpened much faster.
skilldesc.-10: Weapons take longer to sharpen.

name: Guard
desc: Decrease or increases knockback when blocking attacks, and decreases or increases stamina loss (and damage taken) when blocking heavier attacks.

skilldesc.15: Greatly decreases knockback when blocking attacks, and greatly decreases stamina loss (and damage taken) when blocking heavier attacks.
skilldesc.10: Decreases knockback when blocking attacks, and decreases stamina loss (and damage taken) when blocking heavier attacks.
skilldesc.-10: Increases knockback when blocking attacks, and increases stamina loss when blocking heavier attacks.

name: Guard Up
desc: Causes previously unblockable attacks to become blockable: Gobul's Water Vortex, Gigginox's Poison Body Slam, Uragaan's Sleep Cloud, Laguiacrus' Massive Electric Discharge, Agnaktor's Firebeam, Ceadeus' Water Blast and Alatreon's Fireball.

name: Reload Spd
desc: Increases or decreases Bowgun reloading speed.

skilldesc.15: Bowgun reloading speed increases 2 levels.
skilldesc.10: Bowgun reloading speed increases 1 level.
skilldesc.-10: Bowgun reloading speed decreases 1 level.

name: Pellet S+
desc: Allows a bowgun to fire all or Lv1 Pellet S.

skilldesc.15: Allows a bowgun to fire all Pellet S levels.
skilldesc.10: Allows a bowgun to fire Pellet S Lv1.

name: Crag S+
desc: Allows a bowgun to fire all or Lv1 Crag S.

skilldesc.15: Allows a bowgun to fire all Crag S levels.
skilldesc.10: Allows a bowgun to fire Crag S Lv1.

name: Clust S+
desc: Allows a bowgun to fire all or Lv1 Clust S.

skilldesc.15: Allows a bowgun to fire all Clust S levels.
skilldesc.10: Allows a bowgun to fire Clust S Lv1.

name: Bomb Boost
desc: Bomb damage is increased. Bomb Combinations are 100%.

name: Hunger
desc: Negates, halves or increases maximum Stamina depletion speed.

skilldesc.15: Negates maximum Stamina depletion.
skilldesc.10: Halves maximum Stamina depletion speed.
skilldesc.-10: Increases maximum Stamina depletion speed.
skilldesc.-15: Greatly increases maximum Stamina depletion speed.

name: Attack
desc: Increases or decreases Attack.

skilldesc.15: Increases Attack.
skilldesc.10: Slightly increases Attack.
skilldesc.-10: Slightly decreases Attack.

name: Defense
desc: Increases or decreases Defense.

skilldesc.15: Increases Defense.
skilldesc.10: Slightly increases Defense.
skilldesc.-10: Slightly decreases Defense.

name: Protection
desc: 25% chance of attacks doing 30% less or more damage.

skilldesc.10: 25% chance of attacks doing 30% less damage.
skilldesc.-10: 25% chance of attacks doing 30% more damage.

name: Wide-Range
desc: Health & status Items used also affect nearby party members.

skilldesc.20: Health & status Items used also affect nearby party members.
skilldesc.10: Health & status Items used also affect nearby party members by a small amount.

name: Wind Res
desc: Negates all or a certain amount of Wind Pressure.

skilldesc.15: Negates all Wind Pressure.
skilldesc.10: Negates a certain amount of Wind Pressure.

name: Gathering
desc: Chance to gather more or less resources in a single spot.

skilldesc.15: Higher chance to gather more resources in a single spot.
skilldesc.10: Chance to gather more resources in a single spot.
skilldesc.-10: Chance to gather less resources in a single spot.

name: Spd Gather
desc: Gathering speed is increased.

name: Psychic
desc: Marked monsters display additional information on the map, such as species and rage.  Higher levels automatically marks monster for the hunter.

skilldesc.15: Activates Detect without having to mark the monster.
skilldesc.10: Marked monsters display additional information on the map, such as species and rage.

name: Rec Level
desc: Increases or decreases the efficiency of Health recovery items.

skilldesc.10: Increases the efficiency of Health recovery items.
skilldesc.-10: Decreases the efficiency of Health recovery items.

name: Evasion
desc: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.

name: Potential
desc: Increases or decreases Defense when Health is below 40%.  Higher levels increases attack power when Health is below 40%.

skilldesc.15: Greatly increases Attack and Defense when Health is below 40%.
skilldesc.10: Greatly increases Defense when Health is below 40%.
skilldesc.-10: Decreases Defense and Attack power when Health is below 40%.

name: Eating
desc: Increases or decreases meat-eating speed.  Higher levels increase item consuming speed as well.

skilldesc.15: Increases meat and item consuming speed.
skilldesc.10: Increases meat-eating speed.
skilldesc.-10: Decreases meat-eating speed.

name: Tremor Res
desc: Prevents staggering from tremors created by large monsters.

name: Crit Draw
desc: Guarantees all draw attacks will be critical.

name: Constitutn
desc: Slows down or speeds up Stamina depletion while evading and blocking.

skilldesc.15: Greatly slows down Stamina depletion while evading and blocking.
skilldesc.10: Slows down Stamina depletion while evading and blocking.
skilldesc.-10: Speeds up Stamina depletion while evading and blocking.
skilldesc.-15: Greatly speeds up Stamina depletion while evading and blocking.

name: Swimming
desc: Increases or descreases your movement speed in water.

skilldesc.10: Increases your movement speed in water.
skilldesc.-10: Decreases your movement speed in water.

name: Dungmaster
desc: Increases Dung Bomb efficiency, and raises their Combo success rate to 100%.

name: Flame Aura
desc: Causes monsters to react as if you are carrying a Torch, even when you aren't.

name: Paralysis
desc: Prevents or doubles the duration of paralysis.

skilldesc.10: Prevents paralysis.
skilldesc.-10: Doubles the duration of paralysis.

name: Sleep
desc: Prevents or doubles the duration of sleep.

skilldesc.10: Prevents sleep.
skilldesc.-10: Doubles the duration of sleep.

name: Stun
desc: Prevents or reduces the likelihood of being stunned or make it harder to recover from being stunned.

skilldesc.15: Prevents stun.
skilldesc.10: Reduces the likelihood of being stunned by 50%.
skilldesc.-10: Makes it harder to recover from being stunned.

name: Mud/Snow
desc: Prevents Snowman and Muddy conditions.

name: Sense
desc: Monsters are less likely or more likely to target you in a group.

skilldesc.10: Monsters are less likely to target you in a group.
skilldesc.-10: Monsters are more likely to target you in a group.

name: Gluttony
desc: Increases efficiency of items that raise maximum Stamina.

skilldesc.15: Increases efficiency of items that raise maximum Stamina.
skilldesc.10: Sometimes increases the effeciency of items that raise maximum Stamina.

name: Anti-Theft
desc: Prevents item theft.

name: Transportr
desc: Travel faster while carrying eggs or powderstones.

name: Fire Res
desc: Increases or decreases Fire resistance.

skilldesc.15: Increases Fire resistance by 15.
skilldesc.10: Increases Fire resistance by 10.
skilldesc.-10: Decreases Fire resistance by 10.

name: Water Res
desc: Increases or decreases Water resistance.

skilldesc.15: Increases Water resistance by 15.
skilldesc.10: Increases Water resistance by 10.
skilldesc.-10: Decreases Water resistance by 10.

name: ThunderRes
desc: Increases or decreases Thunder resistance.

skilldesc.15: Increases Thunder resistance by 15.
skilldesc.10: Increases Thunder resistance by 10.
skilldesc.-10: Decreases Thunder resistance by 10.

name: Ice Res
desc: Increases or decreases Ice resistance.

skilldesc.15: Increases Ice resistance by 15.
skilldesc.10: Increases Ice resistance by 10.
skilldesc.-10: Decreases Ice resistance by 10.

name: Dragon Res
desc: Increases or decreases Dragon resistance.

skilldesc.15: Increases Dragon resistance by 15.
skilldesc.10: Increases Dragon resistance by 10.
skilldesc.-10: Decreases Dragon resistance by 10.

name: Heat Res
desc: Negates or increases damage caused by heat.  Higher levels negates damage received from lava.

skilldesc.15: Negates all heat, as well as damage received from lava.
skilldesc.10: Negates a certain amount of heat.
skilldesc.-10: Increases damage incurred from heat.
skilldesc.-15: Greatly increases damage incurred from heat.

name: Cold Res
desc: Negates or all or a certain amount of cold.  Negative levels increases the speed at which your maximum Stamina depletes from cold.

skilldesc.15: Negates all cold.
skilldesc.10: Negates a certain amount of cold.
skilldesc.-10: Increases the speed at which your maximum Stamina depletes from cold.
skilldesc.-15: Greatly increases the speed at which your maximum Stamina depletes from cold.

name: Map
desc: Map is automatically available or never shown.

skilldesc.10: Map is automatically available.
skilldesc.-10: Map is never shown.

name: Whim
desc: Chance of bugnets/pickaxes/horns breaking is reduced or increased.

skilldesc.15: Chance of bugnets/pickaxes/horns breaking is greatly reduced.
skilldesc.10: Chance of bugnets/pickaxes/horns breaking is reduced.
skilldesc.-10: Chance of bugnets/pickaxes/horns breaking is increased.
skilldesc.-15: Chance of bugnets/pickaxes/horns breaking is greatly increased.

name: Fishing
desc: Causes fish to always bite on the first cast. Raises the efficiency of bait items.

name: Combo Rate
desc: Increases or decreases your Combination success rate.

skilldesc.20: Increases your Combination success rate by 45%.
skilldesc.15: Increases your Combination success rate by 25%.
skilldesc.10: Increases your Combination success rate by 15%.
skilldesc.-10: Decreases your Combination success rate by 5%.
skilldesc.-15: Decreases your Combination success rate by 10%.
skilldesc.-20: Decreases your Combination success rate by 15%.

name: Combo Plus
desc: Guarantees maximum possible Combination results with items such as Bowgun ammo.

name: LastingPwr
desc: Increases or decreases the effect time of certain items.

skilldesc.10: Increases the effect time of certain items.
skilldesc.-10: Decreases the effect time of certain items.

name: Precision
desc: Decreases or increases Deviation while aiming.

skilldesc.15: Greatly decreases Deviation while aiming.
skilldesc.10: Decreases Deviation while aiming.
skilldesc.-10: Increases Deviation while aiming.

name: BBQ
desc: Grants the ability to swiftly and easily roast Well-done Steaks.

name: SpeedSetup
desc: Speeds up trap and bomb setting time. Raises Trap Combinations to 100%.

name: Perception
desc: Monster icon on the map blinks when monsters are ready to be captured.

name: Oxygen
desc: Slows down or speeds up depletion of the Oxygen Gauge.

skilldesc.10: Slows down depletion of the Oxygen Gauge.
skilldesc.-10: Speeds up depletion of the Oxygen Gauge.

name: CurrentRes
desc: Negates all or some water currents created by large monster.

skilldesc.15: Negates the water currents created by large monster.
skilldesc.10: Negates some of the water currents created by large monsters.

name: Survivor
desc: Increases your Attack every time you fall in battle.

name: Blight Res
desc: Negates all elemental Blights (Fire, Water, Thunder, Ice, and Dragon).

name: Auto-Guard
desc: Enables ability to automatically block attacks (when blocking is possible).
